original: KIHLSTRÖM, Olof Emanuel, Redaktör, Mariestad, f österfarnebo 8/6 93 av hemm.äg Erik Olsson o Anna Ek, gm Ingeborg Hallin. Karlskoga prakt lärov realsk, 2 år gymn Sthlm. Eft anst i lantbr m m medarb Värml Läns Tidn 17 o (eft avbr f stud) Norrt Tidn 19—21, red.sekr o 2:e red Bärg-slagsposten 22—26, medarb Jönk Läns Tidn 27—35, omb.m f Fp i Älvsb s 35—36, chefred Mariestads Länstidn sed. 36. Ag sed. 36 Mst Typogr Anst m tidn Mst Länst o Karlsborgs-Tidn. Stdsflm, led dräts.kamm. Led centr.styr Sv Bondeförbs ungd.frb sed. 35, styr.led Mst hantv.frn, innehaft fi uppdr idr- o nyk-th.-rör. Stip.resa (press) Norge 33. T R. °KILANDER, John Napoleon, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Sthlm 29/12 87 av ångbåtsbefäl-hav E N K o Anna Margareta Blomqvist, gm Signe Lindahl. Navigationssk Sthlm 10—12, övermaskinistex 12, maskinist v Sthlms stads elverk v Värtan 12—18, realex 17, komplett f intr v KTH, civingex KTH (maskinbyggn o mek tekn) 22, tjg v Fartygsinsp :s I distr Sthlm 20 o 21, ing v Mell o N :a Sv:s Ång-pannefrn 22, nu förest f Sthlms Fastigh.ägare-frns Tekn Byrå.
translated: KIHLSTRÖM, Olof Emanuel, Editor, Mariestad, born Österfarnebo on 8/6 1893 to home owners Erik Olsson and Anna Ek, married to Ingeborg Hallin. Karlskoga practical school, secondary school in Stockholm for 2 years. Then employed in agriculture and as a collaborator at Värmlands Läns Tidning in 1917 and (interrupted for studies) at Norrtälje Tidning 1919-1921, secretary and 2nd editor at Bärgslagsposten 1922-1926, collaborator at Jönköpings Läns Tidning 1927-1935, representative of the Farmers' Party in Älvsborg County from 1935-1936, editor-in-chief of Mariestads Länstidning since 1936. Member of the Swedish Typographers' Association with the newspaper Mästarens Tidning and Karlsborgs-Tidningen. Member of the City Council, member of the central board of the Swedish Agrarian Youth Association since 1935, board member of the Master Craftsman's Association in Mariestad, held various positions in temperance and sobriety organizations. Received a scholarship to travel to Norway in 1933 (press-related). In a relationship with John Napoleon KILANDER, Engineer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on 29/12 1887 to steamboat captain E N K and Anna Margareta Blomqvist, married to Signe Lindahl. Attended navigation school in Stockholm from 1910-1912, chief engineer diploma in 1912, worked as an engineer at Stockholm City Power Plant in Värtan from 1912-1918, completed secondary school in 1917, completed the full course at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH), obtained a civil engineering degree in mechanical engineering and mechanical technology in 1922, served at the Ship Inspectorate's 1st district in Stockholm in 1920 and 1921, became an engineer at the Central and Northern Sweden Steam Boiler Association in 1922, now heads the Technical Bureau of the Stockholm Property Owners' Association.

structured.name: Olof Emanuel Kihlström
structured.description: Olof Emanuel Kihlström was born on June 8, 1893, in Österfarnebo, Sweden. He was an editor and married to Ingeborg Hallin. His parents were Erik Olsson and Anna Ek.

career.workplace: Central and Northern Sweden Steam Boiler Association
